/* UserDeviceManageSql.xml -> selectUserDevice */ SELECT A.EMP_NO, A.EMP_NM, A.EMP_CD, A.WORK_CD, A.EMAIL , B.PHONE_NO PHONE_NO , B.USERDEVC_IDX, B.DEVC_IDX, B.GUBUN_CD , ( SELECT CD_NM FROM TB_SYS_CD_INFO WHERE CD_GRP_ID = 'ST004' AND CD_ID=B.GUBUN_CD ) GUBUN_NM , C.DEVC_ID, C.BRD_NM, C.MFG_NM , ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_STO_USERDEVC S1 WHERE S1.EMP_NO = A.EMP_NO ) DEV_CNT FROM TB_STO_USER A INNER JOIN TB_STO_USERDEVC B ON A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO INNER JOIN TB_STO_DEVC C ON B.DEVC_IDX = C.DEVC_IDX WHERE B.USERDEVC_IDX = #{USERDEVC_IDX}
SELECT DEVC_IDX, DEVC_ID, BRD_NM, MFG_NM FROM TB_STO_DEVC

SELECT USR.EMP_NO, USR.EMP_NM, GRP.GRP_NM FROM TB_STO_USER USR LEFT JOIN TB_STO_USERGROUP UG ON USR.EMP_NO = UG.EMP_NO AND UG.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TB_STO_GROUP GRP ON UG.GRP_ID = GRP.GRP_ID AND GRP.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE USR.USE_YN = 'Y' AND USR.EMP_NM LIKE '%' || #{EMP_NM} || '%'
